Right: Ghi chu: FPT Telecom khong thu bat ky chi phi nao cua Ung vien, Sinh vien trong qua trinh tuyen dung, thuc tap.

Giới thiệu công ty:
Cong ty Co phan Vien thong FPT (ten goi tat la FPT Telecom) hien la mot trong nhung nha cung cap dich vu Vien thong va Internet hang dau khu vuc.
Thanh lap ngay 31/01/1997, khoi nguon tu Trung tam Dich vu Truc tuyen do 4 thanh vien sang lap cung san pham mang Intranet dau tien cua Viet Nam mang ten "Tri tue Viet Nam - TTVN", san pham duoc coi la dat nen mong cho su phat trien cua Internet tai Viet Nam

Company_Name: CONG TY CO PHAN CONG NGHE VA THIET BI Y TE HELIX
Job: Nhan Vien Trien Khai Phan Mem
Title: Nhan Vien Trien Khai Phan Mem
Description:
Ky su trien khai du an IT lam viec tai Ha Noi. 
- Trien khai, lap dat he thong CNTT chuyen ve hinh anh Y Khoa (PACS) tai cac Benh Vien, co so y te. 
- Theo doi, giam sat hoat dong cua he thong, dam bao he thong van hanh lien tuc. 
- Dao tao, huong dan nguoi dung su dung cac phan mem ung dung. 
- Ho tro nguoi dung trong suot qua trinh su dung ung dung. 
- Thuc hien cac hoat dong bao hanh, bao tri he thong va xu ly cac su co phat sinh. 
- Phoi hop cac phong ban khac trong phan tich nghiep vu, phat trien va trien khai phan mem.
Requirement: - Tot nghiep cao dang/dai hoc chuyen nganh CNTT, dien tu vien thong....
Right:
- Muc luong chinh thuc co ban tu 8.000.000 VND - 12.000.000 VND hoac cao hon tuy vao nang luc, kinh nghiem va thoa thuan truc tiep trong qua trinh phong van. 
- Thuong theo nang luc, thuong theo du an, thuong cuoi nam. 
- Cac che do khac theo quy dinh cua nha nuoc (BHXH, BHYT,..). 
- Moi truong lam viec nang dong, phat trien on dinh trong linh vuc CNTT nganh Y Te 
- Co co hoi tham gia lop dao tao do chuyen gia cua Hang trong va ngoai nuoc huong dan.
Place: 75 Phuong Mai, Dong Da, Ha Noi
Giới thiệu công ty:
Cong ty Co phan XNK Cong nghe thiet bi Vat tu Y te Ha Noi duoc thanh lap ngay 22 / 11 / 2011, dat tru so tai: So 377, Duong Trung Van, Phuong Trung Van, Quan Nam Tu Liem, TP.Ha Noi.
Trong qua trinh 10 nam hinh thanh va phat trien, Cong ty da xay dung duoc he thong doi ngu nhan vien va lanh dao chuyen nghiep hoa, gom nhieu thanh vien da co kinh nghiem lau nam trong cac cong ty lon, dau nganh. Thuc hien nhieu hop dong cung cap Thiet bi y te, vat tu tieu hao, hoa chat cho nhieu don vi va ca nhan, duoc danh gia cao ve nang luc trien khai du an, trinh do chuyen mon cua doi ngu can bo, cung nhu chat luong kinh doanh va dich vu doi voi khach hang.
Mo hinh van hanh hoat dong cong ty duoc bo tri theo chieu ngang, lam gia tang su thuan tien trong viec van hanh co may kinh doanh va gia tang su phoi hop thong nhat giua cac bo phan trong cong ty.

Company_Name: Cong ty Co Phan Dau Tu Cong Nghe HACOM
Job: Nhan Vien Ban Hang Sieu Thi - Thu Nhap Len Den 13 Trieu
Title: Nhan Vien Ban Hang Sieu Thi - Thu Nhap Len Den 13 Trieu
Place: 131 Le Thanh Nghi - Hai Ba Trung - Ha Noi
Giới thiệu công ty: Cong ty Co phan Dau tu Cong nghe HACOM (HACOM), tien than la Cong ty Co phan May tinh Ha Noi (HNC - Hanoicomputer) la mot trong nhung doanh nghiep tien phong tai Ha Noi trong linh vuc Kinh doanh cac san pham CNTT va thiet bi van phong. Thanh lap tu nam 2001 den nay, cong ty da tao duoc cho dung vung chac tren thi truong ban buon, ban le. Tro thanh thuong hieu quen thuoc va la doi tac tin cay cua nhieu ban hang trong nuoc va Quoc te. Voi chang duong hon 20 nam tang truong va phat trien khong ngung, cung phuong cham kinh doanh "Uy tin tao dung niem tin" chung toi luon mong muon tim kiem doi ngu cbnv chuyen nghiep, nhiet huyet, day nang luc va co mong muon xay dung su nghiep ben vung va lau dai tai HACOM.

Company_Name: Cong Ty Co Phan Iagree Viet Nam
Title: Full Stack Developer
Description: About the job; The ideal candidate is a creative problem solver who will work in coordination with cross-functional teams to design, develop, and maintain our next generation websites and web tools. You must be comfortable working as part of a team while taking the initiative to take lead on new innovations and projects.; Responsibilities; Revise, edit, proofread & optimize web content Work with cross-functionally to enhance overall user experience of our platforms Own various design tasks involved in the web development life cycle from start to finish
Requirement: Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience in Computer Science At least 1 - 2 years' of experience using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript Proficiency in at least one server-side technology (Java, PHP, NodeJS, Python, Ruby) Ability to multi-task, organize, and prioritize wor
Right:
Salary & Bonuses: Competitive salary, performance-based bonuses, and regular salary reviews.; Career Growth & Training: Clear career path, professional training, and learning support.
Benefits: Additional paid leave, health insurance, meal & transportation allowances.
Work Environment: Open, creative culture with regular team-building activities.
Place: Lau 5 so 256 Nguyen Thi Minh Khai, Phuong Vo Thi Sau, Quan 3

Company_Name: Cong Ty TNHH Dich Vu Quoc Te Bac Nam
Title: Chuyen Vien Media Quay Dung
Description:
1.Quay chup; -Quay phim, chup anh, phoi hop voi thiet ke dung video (am thanh, hinh anh, ky xao...) cho cac clip quang cao cua cong ty.
- Xay dung ke hoach, len y tuong thuc hien he thong video, hinh anh san pham dich vu...cua cong ty.
- Tim kiem video hay, phu hop va co chat luong.; 2.Xu Ly Hinh anh:; - Chiu trach nhiem sang tao, bien tap va danh gia chat luong noi dung tren Fanpage Facebook.
- Xay dung kho luu tru video, hinh anh cac noi dung lien quan toi hoat dong cua cong ty.
- Dung phim, thiet ke, cat/ghep noi dung, tao hieu ung cho Video, cat noi hinh anh,.. san xuat clip quang cao (CTKM, kich ban theo phan canh), viral, CTKM,...cac mang hoat dong theo KH kinh doanh cua cong ty; 3.Su kien; - Tham gia quay chup cac hoat dong su kien truyen thong tai diem ban.
- To chuc quay phim, chup anh, dan dung album, clip truyen thong noi bo phuc vu xay dung va phat trien van hoa doanh nghiep (dao tao, event noi bo dinh ky,...)
- Phoi hop voi cac bo phan lien quan bien tap, tong hop, sang tao noi dung video.
-    Ho tro ky thuat cho cac su kien livestream, quang cao video tren cac nen tang nhu Facebook, YouTube, TikTok.
Requirement:
-    Kinh nghiem lam hau ky it nhat 6 thang (bao gom quang & dung video), uu tien ung vien co ky nang ve cac linh vuc khac co lien quan: animation, motion graphic...)
-    Ung vien co kinh nghiem ve cac san pham me va be la loi the
-    Su dung tot cac cong cu, phan mem can thiet cho cong viec
-    Co kha nang sap xep, to chuc cong viec & tuan thu deadline
-    Chuyen nghiep, trung thuc, nang dong, co trach nhiem voi cong viec va chiu kho hoc hoi.
-    Co ky nang giao tiep va lam viec nhom tot
Right: -Luong, thuong hap dan; -Duoc tham gia bao hiem xa hoi theo quy dinh; -Duoc xet tang luong hang nam; -Thoi gian thu viec: 2 thang; -Duoc tham gia BYXH, BHYT, BHTN theo quy dinh; -Thuong le, Tet, sinh nhat, om dau, che do hieu hy theo quy dinh cua cong ty; -Hang nam cong ty deu to chuc tham quan du lich cho CBCNV
Place: So nha 12, Duong 2 - Xa Mai Dinh - Huyen Soc Son - Ha Noi.
Giới thiệu công ty: Cong ty TNHH Dich vu quoc te Bac Nam la don vi hang dau trong linh vuc nhap khau va phan phoi cac dong san pham hang ngoai noi dia cao cap cac nghanh Me be, tieu dung, cham soc suc khoe va sac dep toan dien. Trong suot thoi gian hoat dong den nay, chung toi la Doi tac uy tin cua nhieu nhan hang noi tieng tren the gioi nhu: Aptamil, Blackmores, Ensure, Pediasure, Healthycare, A2 Milk...cung nhieu cac nhan thuong hieu khac den tu cac nuoc nhu Uc, My, Chau Au.
